import React, {useState , useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AllCourses = () => { const [data , setData] = useState([]) const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('') const [categoryId, setCategoryId] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:5000/course/courses') .then(res => setData(res.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) const handleDelete = (id) => { axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/course/delete-course/${id}`) .then(res => { window.reload() }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } return (
